channel.title: Cebu Pacific on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Cebu Pacific on 0x000216

item.title: Cebu Pacific has been approved for more international routes
item.description: The Philippine Civil Aeronautics Board (CAB) has granted Cebu Pacific (CEB) additional flight entitlements for international routes. These include flights from Manila to the UAE and routes connecting various Philippine cities to Taipei and Kaohsiung in Taiwan. CEB received approval to operate seven more weekly flights between Manila and the UAE. This allows the airline to offer service to any destination within the UAE, expanding upon its current daily flights between Manila and Dubai.
